entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
